plot outline: The story revolves around Krishna (Ajai Rao), and his wife Jyothi (Radhika Pandit). Krishna, who has developed a software program to help the farming community sell their products easily, takes Jyothi to Sweden as per the advice of an astrologer. She has a nightmare involving a series of tragic events. Strangely, those events repeat themselves in real life. They meet with an accident. Will the nightmare come true? The climax offers some nail-baiting moments.
